file.title: Fore color

p.text: Color of text in the object.

p.textAll: All colors can be specified verbally symbol colors (red, blue, black), more on this topic Auxiliary words -> Colors . Either color can be specified in the special form , where the first is the intensity of red color, then a semicolon intensity of the green, and after the semicolon blue. The maximum intensity of 255, minimum 0. For example: "255, 0, 0," = red "0, 0, 255; = blue " 0, 0, 0, "= black " 255, 255, 255, "= white "255, 255, 128," = light yellow

remarks.text: If you want to make a color transparent (not all objects have this feature), set this property to "No" or "".
